and.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_RENTER'
SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_NAME = lower('T_RENTER')
SELECT count(*) FROM sys.user_constraints where CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_RENTER'

column.remarks: Code: data Name: Результат обработки пакета

column.name: BIGDATA
column.remarks: Code: bigData Name: Результат обработки пакета, используется если результат не помещается в поле data

column.remarks: Code: parentObject Name: Ссылка на родительский объект

changeSet.author: partners

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count (*) from sys.all_lobs where owner=USER and table_name=${namecase}('T_RENTERAPICALL') and column_name=${namecase}('BIGDATA') and tablespace_name<>${namecase}('${tablespace_l}')

changeSet.sql: alter table T_RENTERAPICALL move lob (BIGDATA) store as (tablespace ${tablespace_l})

and.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_RENTERAPICALL'
SELECT count(*) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' and TABLE_NAME = lower('T_RENTERAPICALL')
SELECT count(*) FROM sys.user_constraints where CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' and TABLE_NAME = 'T_RENTERAPICALL'
